content: **drops crochet slippers in snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** eu 35/37 - 38/40 42/44 us 5/6½ - 7½/9 - 10/12 uk 3/4 - 5/6½ - 7½/9½ foot length 22 - 25 - 28 cm / 8 ¾ -9 ¾ -11 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 150 g for all sizes color no 37 saphire mix and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 reel color no 02 silver for the edge drops crochet hook size 8 mm / us l/11 - or size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge accessories 10 to 15 glass pearls approx 6 mm / 1/4 in diameter
